title: [Placements]Regarding placements
content:
Now that placements will start in 1 month wanted to ask how to prepare for core subject cn,os and dbms...are the pesu slides enuf or any other resources are better...seniors plz advice needed and if possible give links of those resources too.
And in resume too what kind of projects should be really be present that really matters..like should it be full stack,AI

comments.body: A mix of both Full Stack and AI, wud be be beneficial, and also if u have some experience as well to account that, wud be super useful.
How are the interviews, like do we just discuss about our projects with them, or we have to show the demos also
in F2F interviews yes, u mostly will discuss, I think, but remote interviews, u can demo online if interviewer asks. It heavily depends on company
On campus ones are f2f only no ?
